[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ background_color=”#f7f7f7″ hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_bottom=”5px” border_color_bottom=”#e02b20″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Cryptocurrency And Bitcoin Forensic Investigation” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ background_image=”https://thecyberforensics.com/wptcfadmn/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/Stellar-Cyber-Analytics-Bitcoin.jpg” hover_enabled=”0″ z_index_tablet=”500″ title_font_size=”48px” title_letter_spacing=”1px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” sticky_enabled=”0″ title_font_size_tablet=”42px” title_font_size_phone=”34px” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0.3)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” custom_padding=”10%||10%||true|false”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_post_title meta=”off” featured_image=”off” admin_label=”Cryptocurrency and bitcoin forensic investigation” _builder_version=”3.21.4″ z_index_tablet=”500″][/et_pb_post_title][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ z_index_tablet=”500″]

What we do?

  • Provide ultimate solutions to detect, prevent and investigate cryptocurrency-enabled crimes 
  • We are the masters to recover stolen cryptocurrencies

The cyberforensics cryptocurrency investigation software is being used to detect and investigate a large amount of money transaction records of many law enforcement firms, major financial organizations, and cryptocurrency exchanges. 

Our experts team of forensic data analysts and crypto-technologists render services to any of the following cases:

 1. Be given pay-off or ransom note along with cryptocurrency label or received a kind of plain text mentioned cryptocurrency. Do not    worry at all, we can trace the location or find the possible path of all the accused individuals by using our anti-money laundering software.

2. We can likewise layout findings of any investigation process which further becomes useful in court cases as evidence.

3. Reinforce multi-currency investigations covering Litecoin, Bitcoin, Ether, Bitcoin, and other top digital currencies.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ z_index_tablet=”500″]

Bitcoin Forensics

Turned out the progressive digitization of the world brings financial crime and illegitimate goods business completely moved online. Therefore, make use of dark web increases rapidly year after year and in exchange cryptocurrency becomes the most favorable medium. 

Cryptocurrencies upturn gives rise to all kinds of cash stuff transform into the digital world, facilitates users to create payments online, crosswise over borders and with upgraded user security. These verdicts make the users become key catalysts for online crimes.

At cyber forensics, you can get solutions regarding cryptocurrencies related to unlawful trade of medication/drug dealing and weapons, counterfeit identities, stolen credit cards, Ransomware/malware assaults, pornography and more. In addition, economic crimes like bitcoin fraud, illegal tax avoidance, and money laundering.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ z_index_tablet=”500″]

Investigation Services

The Stellar Cyber Analytics has practical experience in blockchain investigation and transaction tracking. By using our services, the customer gets clearly written and detailed investigation reports of each phase and if requested, the client may get witness statements. Our blockchain forensics have always prompted positive results as we use a blend of off-chain and on-chain examination and analytical strategies. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
